item.title: Making again
item.description: This is an extension of my last post: A brief musical journey, as well as a number of stories which I've been posting on Instagram in recent days. As part of my of my adventures in the world of producing elecronic music I came across the fascinating world of modular synthesis. Modular synthesizers are composable musical instruments which are built up of many discrete modules, almost like the Lego bricks of synthesizers.
